scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3:d3 -n bumpsChart -o build/d3-bumps-chart.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-bumps-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-bumps-chart.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-bumps-chart.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-bumps-chart.js build/d3-bumps-chart.min.js
